meanings.definition: An optical instrument with two eyepieces used to view photographs or other images in three dimensions.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a collection of stereoscopes for visitors to see old photos in 3D.
meanings.sent2: She peered through the stereoscopes to see the landscape come to life.
meanings.sent3: The detective used the stereoscopes to uncover hidden clues in the mysterious photo.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a stereoscope, revealing layers of meaning in the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The stereoscopes transported her to a world where pictures popped out of the frame.

meanings.definition: To view or create images in three dimensions using a stereoscope.
meanings.sent1: He stereoscopes the pictures to make them look more realistic.
meanings.sent2: They stereoscope the movie scenes to add depth to the visuals.
meanings.sent3: The artist stereoscopes the drawings, making them jump off the page.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination stereoscopes the story, bringing characters to life.
meanings.sent5: Stereoscoping the photos gave them a magical quality, like stepping into a fairy tale.
